Author: SemicolonButterfly
Text: If he’s leaving a job where he currently has health insurance (and you’re in the US) there’s usually an option for COBRA insurance during the gap. Basically you pay the old employer to continue your current coverage. Prices can vary wildly and it’s often expensive (I was paying $750/mo just for me) but depending on your/his healthcare needs it can be worth investigating. Best of luck to the both of you!
